mapper.insert: insert into delivery(d_dno, d_cpname, d_odno, d_rpnname, d_tel, d_addr, d_register, d_price) values((select nvl(max(d_dno),0)+1 from delivery), #{d_cpname}, #{d_odno}, #{d_rpnname}, #{d_tel}, #{d_addr}, #{d_register}, #{d_price})
mapper.select: select * from delivery order by d_dno asc
mapper.update: update delivery set d_cpname = #{d_cpname}, d_rpnname = #{d_rpnname} where d_dno = #{d_dno}
